Exercise Solutions and Notes for “R for Data Science” Welcome

Exercise Solutions and Notes for “R for Data Science” Jeffrey B. Arnold Welcome This contains my exercise solutions and notes for Hadley Wickham and Garret Grolemund, R for Data Science. The original website is at r4ds.had.co.nz. Note that the chapter and section numbers don’t exactly match those of R4DS. Refer to the titles, not the numbers.
